title: ICYMI: Dior Confirms Jonathan Anderson, 2025 CFDA/'Vogue' Fashion Fund Finalists & Tech Is Fueling Fashion Resale's Future
description: In case you missed them, we've rounded up our most popular stories of the week to help you stay in the loop.
